org.lenskit.api

Interface ItemScorer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractItemScorer, BiasedMFItemScorer, BiasItemScorer, ConstantItemScorer, FallbackItemScorer, FunkSVDItemScorer, GlobalMeanRatingItemScorer, ItemItemScorer, ItemMeanRatingItemScorer, LeastSquaresItemScorer, PopularityRankItemScorer, PrecomputedItemScorer, RatingPredictorItemScorer, SimpleCachingItemScorer, SlopeOneItemScorer, UserMeanItemScorer, UserUserItemScorer, WeightedSlopeOneItemScorer

    public interface ItemScorer

    Score items for users. These scores can be predicted ratings, relevance scores, purchase probabilities, or any other real-valued score which can be assigned to an item for a particular user.

    Compatibility
    Public

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<Long,Double> score(long user, Collection<Long> items)
      Score a collection of items.
      Result score(long user, long item)
      Score a single item.
      ResultMap scoreWithDetails(long user, Collection<Long> items)
      Score a collection of items and potentially return more details on the scores.

    • Method Detail

      • score

        Result score(long user,
             long item)

        Score a single item.

        Parameters:
        user - The user ID for whom to generate a score.
        item - The item ID to score.
        Returns:
        The score, or null if no score can be generated.

      • score

        @Nonnull
Map<Long,Double> score(long user,
                                 @Nonnull
                                 Collection<Long> items)

        Score a collection of items.

        Parameters:
        user - The user ID for whom to generate scores.
        items - The item to score.
        Returns:
        The scores for the items. This result set may not contain all requested items.

      • scoreWithDetails

        @Nonnull
ResultMap scoreWithDetails(long user,
                                     @Nonnull
                                     Collection<Long> items)

        Score a collection of items and potentially return more details on the scores.

        Parameters:
        user - The user ID for whom to generate scores.
        items - The item to score.
        Returns:
        The scores for the items. This result set may not contain all requested items. Implementations that support additional details will return a subclass of ResultMap that provides access to those details.
